extensionDescription.message: Snooze articles in Pocket to a later time

toastCloseButton.description: Toast button to close the message.

toastNotLoggedIn.message: Looks like you've been logged out of Pocket. Please log back in!
toastNotLoggedIn.description: Toast error message for when the user lost their log-in credentials.

toastCannotUnsnooze.description: Toast error message for when unsnoozing an item failed.

toastCannotSnooze.description: Toast error message for when snoozing an item failed.

toastCannotSync.description: Toast error message for when unsnoozing an item failed.

panelTabAction.description: Panel tab title for the snooze section.

panelDateTimePickerPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the date-time picker for snoozing.

panelTabSnoozed.description: Panel tab title for the list of snoozed items.

panelSyncButton.description: Title text for the sync button on the snoozed list tab.

panelNothingSnoozed.description: Panel text informing the user that the list of snoozed items is empty.

panelUnsnoozeButton.description: Button text to unsnooze an already snoozed item.

panelSnoozeButton.description: Button text to snooze the active page with the chosen date-time.

optionsAutoSave.description: Text informing the user that options are automatically saved.

optionsMorningTime.description: Label for choosing the morning time in the options page.

optionsEveningTime.description: Label for choosing the morning time in the options page.

optionsWeekendWeekStartDays.message: First day of the week and the weekend
optionsWeekendWeekStartDays.description: Label for choosing what days are the start of the week/weekend in the options page.

optionsWeekendWeekStartCaption.message: Based on the Wikipedia article “Workweek and weekend”
optionsWeekendWeekStartCaption.description: Label caption explaining where the list of weekdays and weekends comes from.

week.description: Name of the first day of the week.

weekend.description: Name of the first day of the weekend.
